price: 49. Y cuando se alejó de ellos y de lo que invocaban (y adoraban) fuera de Al-lah, le concedimos a Isaac, y a (este le concedimos a) Jacob. Y ambos fueron profetas.
arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: falammā iʿ'tazalahum wamā yaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi wahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wakullan jaʿalnā nabiyyan
